entry.title: .Coconut Bowl & Cutlery Set Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 520.00

A perfect Combo for those Coconut lovers!

The lightweight rustic cutlery is naturally stylish and can make great companion when you are on the go! By using our Coconut cutlery, one can avoid tons of single-use plastic waste, promoting a plastic-free and healthy environment.

Our Coconut Bowls are made from coconuts which are discarded as waste after their juice and flesh has been used. The coconut shells are then thoroughly cleaned and cut to make Coconut Bowls which can be a great way to enjoy your early morning salads or rice bowls and much more.

Contains

1 * Coconut Bowl

1 × Spoon

1 × Fork

*Material – Coconut

*Care –

-Hand-wash with Luke Warm water and mild soap.

-Use Coconut Oil to rehydrate your Cutlery

*Note – Do not use in Microwave and Dishwasher.

*Disposal – Once it wears out, Compost it.

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

entry.title: .Reusable Neem Wood Cutlery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 250.00

Our neem wood cutlery is a sustainable and perfect pair for taking on the go, using for lunches and during travel.

This lightweight rustic cutlery is naturally stylish and can make great companion when you are on the go! By using our Neem cutlery, one can avoid tons of single-use plastic waste, promoting a plastic-free and healthy environment.

Neem wood is naturally durable and resistant to water, making it perfect for serving both hot and cold dishes. The smooth finish and ergonomic design ensure a comfortable experience.

Contains

1 × Spoon

1 × Fork

*Material – Neem Wood

*Care –

-Hand-wash with Luke Warm water and mild soap.

-Use Coconut Oil to rehydrate your Cutlery

Note – Do not use in Microwave and Dishwasher.

*Disposal – Once it wears out, Compost it.

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

entry.title: Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Set with Cleaning Brush & Cotton Pouch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 250.00

Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Set – Eco-Friendly, Durable & Travel-Ready

Say Goodbye to Plastic – Sip Sustainably with Almitra

Make the switch to a greener lifestyle with Almitra Sustainables’ Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Set. Thoughtfully crafted for the eco-conscious consumer, this stylish and practical alternative to single-use plastic straws is perfect for daily use at home, office, cafés, or on the go. Whether you're sipping smoothies, juices, or iced coffee, this sustainable straw set has you covered.

What’s Included

  • 2 Premium-Grade Stainless Steel Straws – Rust-resistant, BPA-free, and reusable for years.
  • 1 Natural Fiber Cleaning Brush – Keeps your straws hygienic and easy to clean.
  • 1 Organic Cotton Carry Pouch – Branded, breathable, and ideal for on-the-go convenience.

Why You’ll Love It

  • Eco-Friendly & Zero Waste – Helps reduce plastic pollution and supports a more sustainable lifestyle.
  • Durable & Safe – Made from high-quality stainless steel that’s food-safe and non-toxic.
  • Stylish & Functional – Sleek metallic finish with a minimalist aesthetic.
    Perfect for Gifting – A thoughtful present for eco-warriors, students, travelers, and more.
  • Easy to Clean – Cleaning brush included; dishwasher-safe for extra convenience.

Ideal For

  • Daily hydration and on-the-go sipping
  • Zero waste homes and eco-friendly cafés
  • Festivals, travel kits, and office lunches
  • Eco-conscious gifting

Reusable Stainless Steel Bent Straw Set – With Cleaner & Cotton Pouch

Sip Sustainably, Anywhere You Go

Ditch the plastic and elevate your eco-routine with our Stainless Steel Bent Straw Set, thoughtfully designed for conscious sipping. Crafted from high-grade stainless steel, these straws are durable, stylish, and built to last—perfect for smoothies, juices, coffee, or your favorite cold drinks.

This zero-waste set includes:

  • 2 Bent Stainless Steel Straws
  • 1 Natural Fiber Cleaning Brush
  • 1 Organic Cotton Travel Pouch, screen-printed with “Almitra Sustainables”

Whether you're at home, traveling, or dining out, this compact, reusable set helps you reduce single-use plastic waste and embrace a more sustainable lifestyle with ease.

Why Choose Almitra’s Reusable Straw Set?

  • Plastic-Free & Planet-Friendly
  • Rust-Resistant & Long-Lasting
  • Easy to Clean with Included Brush
  • Travel-Ready with Cotton Carry Pouch
  • Elegant, Minimalist, and Conscious Design

Make every sip a statement. Choose reusable. Choose sustainable. Choose Almitra.

entry.title: .Larona Tote Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 450.00

Larona is a beautiful Handwoven Tote which captures the jazzy Color spectrum of a Rainbow, that’s why it’s called a Rainbow Tote!

A convenient, stylish and sustainable companion for your daily shopping. The bag comes with a zipped pocket inside, which can be used for keys, as a coin pouch or to keep your handphone protected. It’s sturdy and soft, offering a great grip and comfortable carry.

These bags are made by small artist groups and made with minimal waste. The structure designing and sewing is done in a conscious way to avoid waste and provide maximum optimization. Carry your essentials in a chic and conscientious manner with our upcycled tote bags.

Size – 38.1cms h * 40.64 cms w

Material – 100% Cotton

Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly
